## QUESTION 2

__Use the same query as above, but only include players with at least 10 at bats that year. Print the top 5 results.__  

_Describe your results and analysis here_

```{python}
# Include and execute your code here
q = '''
    SELECT  playerID,
            G as 'Games Managed',
            W as 'Wins',
            L as 'Losses',
            --CAST(W AS FLOAT) /G AS 'Win %',
            round ((W*1.0/G),3) as 'Win %'
    FROM managers
    WHERE G >20 AND yearID >2000 AND
        (teamID NOT IN ('OAK','ATL')) OR
        teamID LIKE 'S%'
    ORDER BY "Win %" DESC
'''
managers = pd.read_sql_query(q,con)
managers
```
